description.oldValue:
, Use device buttons to control call (answer, end, hold) from Bluetooth audio devices without needing a USB dongle when connected to a Windows PC running Teams desktop client. For many headsets and speakerphones, this will work without requiring any user action to enable other than pairing the headset or speakerphone with the PC. Watch our certification page for additional information coming soon about devices tested to meet all certification criteria with native Bluetooth connections (w/o a USB dongle).
GA date: July CY2022
Preview date: March CY2022
description.newValue:
, Use device buttons to control call (answer, end,
hold) from Bluetooth audio devices without needing a USB dongle when connected
to a Windows PC running Teams desktop client. For many headsets and
speakerphones, this will work without requiring any user action to enable other
than pairing the headset or speakerphone with the PC. Watch our certification
page for additional information coming soon about devices tested to meet all
certification criteria with native Bluetooth connections (w/o a USB dongle).
